name: Rubiks Unboxed - Lite Edition
description: Rubiks Unboxed is an unfolded variant of the classic Rubik's Cube we all know and love. If you have never played around with a Rubik's cube, this app might be a great way to start learning and get a feel for it. To all the veteran cubers out there: Don't be fooled, Rubiks Unboxed is very unintuitive compared to its 3D counterpart and mastering it will require patience and dedication! Also get the full version to see who can reach the top of those Speed Cube leaderboards!
